title: Kuaizhou-1A returns to flight with test satellite launch
summary: A Chinese Kuaizhou-1A rocket sent the Tianxing-1 satellite into orbit late Tuesday, marking a return to flight six months after the solid light-light launcher suffered failure.

title: SpaceX gets permit for “Project Echo” in Central Texas
summary: On June 6, 2022, the Texas Commission on Environmental Quality approved a permit for a SpaceX construction project called “Project Echo.” The...

title: SmallSat Alliance unveils Collegiate Space Competition
summary: The SmallSat Alliance is inviting U.S. university students to propose space-related solutions for formidable technical and policy challenges as part of the Collegiate Space Competition.

title: SpaceX warns 5G plan would deny Starlink to most Americans
summary: SpaceX warned June 21 that its Starlink broadband network would become unusable for most Americans if a proposal to use the 12 GHz band for terrestrial 5G is approved.

title: NASA's InSight Gets a Few Extra Weeks of Mars Science
summary: The mission’s team has chosen to operate its seismometer longer than previously planned, although the lander will run out of power sooner as a result.
